item.title: XML and Visual Basic
item.description: What happens when one of the most popular programming languages in the world meets XML? This article explains how to use XML with Visual Basic, and the effect XML is having on VB application design.

item.title: Exposing Application Services With SOAP
item.description: In this tutorial for advanced users of Visual Basic, James Snell shares his experience of the Microsoft SOAP toolkit and demonstrates how to construct web services.

item.title: Visual Basic and the XML DOM: An Annotated Example
item.description: Our annotated example gives an easy introduction to using Visual Basic and XML together. This article is an extract from the book "XML Programming with VB and ASP."

item.title: Schemas Revisited
item.description: The XML-DEV mailing list has seen a renewed vigor in discussion recently, with the spotlight being turned on the troubled issue of XML Schemas.

item.title: Smalltalk Interchange Format in XML (SMIX).
item.description: Masashi Umezawa is developing 'Smalltalk Interchange Format in XML (SMIX)' as "a new Smalltalk Interchange Format. It is basically based on the ANSI Smalltalk Interchange Format (version 1.0)." The web site provides a SMIX XML DTD, a sample XML document, and an alpha version of a simple SMIX generator.
